name: Graveyard Dragon
description: The Graveyard Dragon is a massive undead creature embodying the remnants of its former life as a dragon, resembling a pile of dragon bones when motionless.
memorable: Its ability to deal damage to nearby creatures and survive damage from its breath weapon makes it a unique and formidable foe.
goals: To instill fear and dominate in combat using its powerful elemental attacks.
relations: Related to other undead creatures and potentially dominates lesser undead.
environment: Often found in graveyards, ruins, or places associated with death and decay.
strengths: Immunity to poison, resistance to necrotic damage, and the ability to deal elemental damage.
weaknesses: Average dexterity and a reliance on stamina make it less evasive.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack consisting of a bite delivering piercing damage and two claw strikes inflicting slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Breath Weapon, which unleashes devastating elemental damage in an area.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to perceive its surroundings without light.
skills: Possesses proficiency in Stealth and Perception, allowing it to remain hidden and aware.
additional_information: Elemental Aura causes damage to those nearby at the start of its turn.
False Appearance allows it to blend in as a pile of bones.
Reassemble Bones grants it tactical flexibility in movement.
Can deal significant damage with elemental breath weapon.
